Controllers

Controllers are objects which are used to controll the site building process. For example you can change item url using permalink controller or modify item metadata using @before.

List of available controllers

  • after

Modyfing item content before writing it to the output.

  • assets

Yields asset items.

  • before

Modyfing item metadata before it rendering.

  • helper

Calling functions during template rendering.

  • ignore

Ignoring files and directories.

  • layout

Rendering a item content using layout files.

  • pages

Yields page items.

  • permalink

Modyfing items urls.

  • render_file

Rendering files using template engine.
